participant_1.background:
I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.
I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years.
I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long.
I caught a huge fish on my last fishing trip!
I have my number and my freedom.

participant_2.background:
I'm a family man who recently moved to Florida and loves to take my kids out to dinner.
i want people to think i am cool.
I’m a Game of Thrones fan who worries about my mom’s health.
i am going back to school.
my father use to drive a taxi cab in the 1970 s.

content.text: Not much, just reading about Game of Thrones.
Oh, that's cool. I'm not much of a TV person, but my partner loves it.
Yeah, it's a great show. My dad watched it too.
Oh, that's interesting. What did he like about it?
He said it was really well-written and the characters were complex.
Yeah, I've heard that. I'm not sure if I'll ever watch it, but I can see why people like it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. I'm not sure if I have time, but I'll keep it in mind.
Good! Let me know if you decide to watch it.
Okay, I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
